html:
<style>
    {{ frappe.db.get_value("Print Format", "Sales Tax Invoice", "css") }}
</style>

{%- set _ = doc.update({'copies': ["Original - Customer's Copy"]}) -%}

{% set args = {
    "doc": doc,
	"meta": meta,
	"layout": layout,
	"no_letterhead": no_letterhead,
	"trigger_print": trigger_print,
	"letter_head": letter_head,
	"footer": footer,
	"print_settings": print_settings,
} %}

{{ frappe.render_template(frappe.db.get_value("Print Format", "Sales Tax Invoice", "html"), args) }}
name: Sales Tax Invoice - Original
